name: Crescent Apache Mod & Community
short_description: mod_crescent is the core of the crescent virtual community system (see below). It is another MySQL authentication module for Apache. Tested on Solaris, OpenBSD, Linux and Win32. It has a high speed cache to make your db happy. This is not mod_auth_mysql
